Introduction

Loren, also known as DJ Boid, is a singer and producer under THEBLACKLABEL and releases music through his own indie label, Fire Exit Records. He made his official debut with the digital single "Empty Trash" on November 13, 2020.

He is the founder of FIRE EXIT RECØRDS.

Loren was first known for being a producer for YG Entertainment artists and for appearing in BLACKPINK's "Lovesick Girls" music video.

In March 2023, he joined the recording label 88rising. Together with THEBLACKLABEL, he plans to release his music through this partnership.
